title: Bows (skill)
data:
{{obsolete}}
''For the bows still in the game, that now use the [[Ranged Weapons]] skill, see [[shortbow]] and [[longbow]].''

The '''Bows''' skill governs your character's mastery of [[shortbow]]s and [[longbow]]s. All bows are ranged weapons that require two hands to fire [[arrow]]s. See the [[weapon#Ranged weapons|weapon]] page for a list of all bows and their properties.
